fields.name: enforceSchema
fields.title: Enforce Schema
fields.description: If it is set to true, the specified or inferred schema will be forcibly applied to datasource files, and headers in CSV files will be ignored. If the option is set to false, the schema will be validated against all headers in CSV files in the case when the header option is set to true.

fields.name: comment
fields.value:
Churn Prediction:

Refer the Churn Data Analysis workflows for data exploration.


Total day minutes and Total day charge are highly correlated fields. Such correlated data won't be very beneficial for our model training runs, so we're going to remove them. We'll do so by dropping one column of each pair of correlated fields, along with the State and Area code columns, which we also wonÃ¢ÂÂt use.


Use stratified sampling for split.
fields.title: Comment
fields.description: Comments for the Workflow
